title: Game Crash- Durong Game Match Loading
body:
I have had this problem for almost a week now. I'm at a total loss. I have tried everything listed on the game crash page for windows. I have even tried other ways  found by players. I have even Hard reset my computer, and re restored it. Minus this bad boy running much better, I still am unable to play a game with out seeing screen of black misery. 

My directx is up to date. 

I have tried renaming the system files. 

but after some extensive reading I found this.   ERROR| RadsOpenFile: RADS cannot open file "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.110/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml" because it's not in the manifest.
000012.427|       0.0000kb|      0.0000kb added|  ERROR| Missing file on r3dGFile open :C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.110/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml
000012.428|       0.0000kb|      0.0000kb added|  ERROR| RadsOpenFile: RADS cannot open file "\Bin\Data\C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.110/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml" because it's not in the manifest.
000012.428|       0.0000kb|      0.0000kb added|  ERROR| Missing file on r3dGFile open :\Bin\Data\C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.110/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml
****
I literally just re downloaded the game on to a fresh computer. So why would it be throwing error for this?

Then there is this bugger I found: 000070.181|       0.0000kb|      0.0000kb added| ALWAYS| Bugsplat disabled (end of game?). Why ould the bug splat be disabled?

replies.body: +Dragon Kate, +Goldpikaknight, thanks, they are helping me now with the issue. I have started reading everything and anything when it come to code and this game seeing what the issue or inference could be. I have disabled my firewalls, reinstalled network3.5, updated my AMD Catalyst center, verified correct driver update and driver locates, and driver command prompts. I thought is was the internet, but I tried someone elses, same service, and got same bugsplat issue. I have had only one ray of hope, and that in a custom match it loaded a game with nidalee, so I thought I was good, loaded another custom, it worked. But when I went into play a match with people it freaked and strted to load and splat.

I feel you, I've been dealing with this for WEEKS. Seems the outage lasts anywhere from 8 to 10 hours. It's been crashing after champ select all day. I test it with a custom game so no leaver status. I tried everything too, and all the support team says is that it is MY network or computer. Extremely frustrating.

Hey Irdnecros, 

If you have tried everything under the sun and can't get your game to stop crashing, it's probably best to reach out to RIot through ticket. There they will be able to give you the help you need. 

Riot Support Ticket: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Hope they get ya fixed up soon :) 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
